Title: The Visit
Overview: A brother and sister are sent to their grandparents' remote Pennsylvania farm for a week, where they discover that the elderly couple is involved in something deeply disturbing.
Tagline: No one loves you like your grandparents.
Keywords: rap music, pennsylvania, brother sister relationship, farm, grandparents, murder, children, independent film, farmhouse, single mother, violence, oven, found footage, hide and seek, diaper
Cast: Olivia DeJonge, Ed Oxenbould, Kathryn Hahn
